title: SdkResolution.SdkResolverService should be globalized for netcore evaluation
body:
Child of #6034.

For 400 projects it takes about 1650ms. Can we make this a global task instead of per project and can it be cached after first evaluation?

nodes.body: I believe this task is complete now because of the CPS side consumption of the shared evaluation context apis that showed ~5% solution load gains. @ladipro fyi. Closing this ask.
